subject: Pedals problem
description_text:
Hello,
Since I installed the new Simsonn Manager software, the pedals are no longer recognized! There are no inputs or axes displayed.

Pro pedals V3 firmware 1.7.0
Also not recognized with Simsonn Pro Pedals Config V3.

The control box is green.

Thank you,
Francois

conversations.body_text: This ticket has been closed and merged into ticket 36.
